resume.me01:
Hello! My name is {{name}} {{subTitle}} with 2 years of experience in agile environments, specialized in creating scalable and efficient solutions, applying best practices such as the SOLID methodology. 
In addition to my technical skills, I have a strong focus on design and usability, ensuring intuitive and attractive interfaces for a better user experience. 
I am looking for new challenges where I can continue growing and contribute my knowledge in web development.
